verses.verse: וְעַתָּ֣ה <WH6258> Now יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> O Israel שְׁמַ֤ע <WH8085> Now therefore hearken אֶל־ <WH413> to הַֽחֻקִּים֙ <WH2706> unto the statutes וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to הַמִּשְׁפָּטִ֔ים <WH4941> and unto the judgments אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> which אָֽנֹכִ֛י <WH595> I מְלַמֵּ֥ד <WH3925> which I teach אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> לַעֲשׂ֑וֹת <WH6213> you for to do לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> so תִּֽחְי֗וּ <WH2421> [them] that ye may live וּבָאתֶם֙ <WH935> and go in וִֽירִשְׁתֶּ֣ם <WH3423> and possess אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> the land אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> which יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> God אֲבֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <WH1> of your fathers נֹתֵ֥ן <WH5414> giveth לָכֶֽם׃

לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor תֹסִ֗פוּ <WH3254> Ye shall not add עַל־ <WH5921> unto הַדָּבָר֙ <WH1697> unto the word אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which אָנֹכִי֙ <WH595> I מְצַוֶּ֣ה <WH6680> which I command אֶתְכֶ֔ם <WH853> וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> nor תִגְרְע֖וּ <WH1639> you neither shall ye diminish מִמֶּ֑נּוּ <WH4480> that לִשְׁמֹ֗ר <WH8104> [ought] from it that ye may keep אֶת־ <WH853> מִצְוֹת֙ <WH4687> the commandments יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֔ם <WH430> your God אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which אָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> I מְצַוֶּ֥ה <WH6680> which I command אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <WH853>

עֵֽינֵיכֶם֙ <WH5869> Your eyes הָֽרֹאֹ֔ת <WH7200> have seen אֵ֛ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who עָשָׂ֥ה <WH6213> did יְהוָ֖ה <WH3069> God בְּבַ֣עַל פְּע֑וֹר <WH1187> because of Baalpeor כִּ֣י <WH3588> for כָל־ <WH3605> for all הָאִ֗ישׁ <WH376> for all the men אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> who הָלַךְ֙ <WH1980> along אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> after that בַֽעַל־ פְּע֔וֹר <WH1187> Baalpeor הִשְׁמִיד֛וֹ <WH8045> hath destroyed יְהוָ֥ה <WH3069> God אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God מִקִּרְבֶּֽךָ׃ <WH7130> them from among

וְאַתֶּם֙ <WH859> who הַדְּבֵקִ֔ים <WH1695> But ye that did cleave בַּיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֑ם <WH430> your God חַיִּ֥ים <WH2416> [are] alive כֻּלְּכֶ֖ם <WH3605> every הַיּֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> every one of you this day

רְאֵ֣ה ׀ <WH7200> Behold לִמַּ֣דְתִּי <WH3925> I have taught אֶתְכֶ֗ם <WH853> חֻקִּים֙ <WH2706> you statutes וּמִשְׁפָּטִ֔ים <WH4941> and judgments כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> even as צִוַּ֖נִי <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהָ֑י <WH430> my God לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <WH6213> me that ye should do כֵּ֔ן <WH3651> thus בְּקֶ֣רֶב <WH7130> so in הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after אַתֶּ֛ם <WH859> you בָּאִ֥ים <WH935> whither ye go שָׁ֖מָּה <WH8033> in it לְרִשְׁתָּֽהּ׃ <WH3423> to possess

וּשְׁמַרְתֶּם֮ <WH8104> Keep וַעֲשִׂיתֶם֒ <WH6213> therefore and do כִּ֣י <WH3588> for הִ֤וא <WH1931> that חָכְמַתְכֶם֙ <WH2451> [them] for this [is] your wisdom וּבִ֣ינַתְכֶ֔ם <WH998> and your understanding לְעֵינֵ֖י <WH5869> in the sight הָעַמִּ֑ים <WH5971> of the nations אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who יִשְׁמְע֗וּן <WH8085> which shall hear אֵ֚ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַחֻקִּ֣ים <WH2706> all these statutes הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> these וְאָמְר֗וּ <WH559> and say רַ֚ק <WH7535> but עַם־ <WH5971> people חָכָ֣ם <WH2450> [is] a wise וְנָב֔וֹן <WH995> and understanding הַגּ֥וֹי <WH1471> nation הַגָּד֖וֹל <WH1419> Surely this great הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

כִּ֚י <WH3588> For מִי־ <WH4310> what ג֣וֹי <WH1471> For what nation גָּד֔וֹל <WH1419> [is there so] great אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after ל֥וֹ אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> who [hath] God קְרֹבִ֣ים <WH7138> [so] nigh אֵלָ֑יו <WH413> to כַּיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> unto them as the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <WH430> our God בְּכָל־ <WH3605> whenever קָרְאֵ֖נוּ <WH7121> [is] in all [things that] we call אֵלָֽיו׃ <WH413> about

וּמִי֙ <WH4310> what גּ֣וֹי <WH1471> And what nation גָּד֔וֹל <WH1419> [is there so] great אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which ל֛וֹ חֻקִּ֥ים <WH2706> that hath statutes וּמִשְׁפָּטִ֖ים <WH4941> and judgments צַדִּיקִ֑ם <WH6662> [so] righteous כְּכֹל֙ <WH3605> whole הַתּוֹרָ֣ה <WH8451> as all this law הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> likewise אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> which אָנֹכִ֛י <WH595> I נֹתֵ֥ן <WH5414> which I set לִפְנֵיכֶ֖ם <WH6440> before הַיּֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> age

רַ֡ק <WH7535> but הִשָּׁ֣מֶר <WH8104> Only take heed לְךָ֩ וּשְׁמֹ֨ר <WH8104> to thyself and keep נַפְשְׁךָ֜ <WH5315> thy soul מְאֹ֗ד <WH3966> diligently פֶּן־ <WH6435> so תִּשְׁכַּ֨ח <WH7911> lest thou forget אֶת־ <WH853> הַדְּבָרִ֜ים <WH1697> the things אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which רָא֣וּ <WH7200> have seen עֵינֶ֗יךָ <WH5869> which thine eyes וּפֶן־ <WH6435> so יָס֙וּרוּ֙ <WH5493> and lest they depart מִלְּבָ֣בְךָ֔ <WH3824> from thy heart כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all יְמֵ֣י <WH3117> all the days חַיֶּ֑יךָ <WH2416> of thy life וְהוֹדַעְתָּ֥ם <WH3045> but teach לְבָנֶ֖יךָ <WH1121> them thy sons וְלִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> and thy sons' בָנֶֽיךָ׃ <WH1121> sons

י֗וֹם <WH3117> [Specially] the day אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> so עָמַ֜דְתָּ <WH5975> that thou stoodest לִפְנֵ֨י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֶיךָ֮ <WH430> thy God בְּחֹרֵב֒ <WH2722> in Horeb בֶּאֱמֹ֨ר <WH559> said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> when the LORD אֵלַ֗י <WH413> to me הַקְהֶל־ <WH6950> together לִי֙ אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> me the people וְאַשְׁמִעֵ֖ם <WH8085> and I will make them hear אֶת־ <WH853> דְּבָרָ֑י <WH1697> my words אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> so יִלְמְד֜וּן <WH3925> that they may learn לְיִרְאָ֣ה <WH3372> to fear אֹתִ֗י <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַיָּמִים֙ <WH3117> me all the days אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> so הֵ֤ם <WH1992> they חַיִּים֙ <WH2416> that they shall live עַל־ <WH5921> on הָ֣אֲדָמָ֔ה <WH127> upon the earth וְאֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH1121> their children יְלַמֵּדֽוּן׃ <WH3925> and [that] they may teach

וַתִּקְרְב֥וּן <WH7126> And ye came near וַתַּֽעַמְד֖וּן <WH5975> and stood תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> the foot הָהָ֑ר <WH2022> under the mountain וְהָהָ֞ר <WH2022> and the mountain בֹּעֵ֤ר <WH1197> burned בָּאֵשׁ֙ <WH784> with fire עַד־ <WH5704> against לֵ֣ב <WH3820> unto the midst הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> of heaven חֹ֖שֶׁךְ <WH2822> and thick darkness עָנָ֥ן <WH6051> clouds וַעֲרָפֶֽל׃ <WH6205> with darkness

וַיְדַבֵּ֧ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <WH413> to you מִתּ֣וֹךְ <WH8432> unto you out of the midst הָאֵ֑שׁ <WH784> of the fire ק֤וֹל <WH6963> the voice דְּבָרִים֙ <WH1697> of the words אַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> you שֹׁמְעִ֔ים <WH8085> ye heard וּתְמוּנָ֛ה <WH8544> no similitude אֵינְכֶ֥ם <WH369> no רֹאִ֖ים <WH7200> but saw זוּלָתִ֥י <WH2108> only קֽוֹל׃ <WH6963> [ye heard] a voice

וַיַּגֵּ֨ד <WH5046> And he declared לָכֶ֜ם אֶת־ <WH853> בְּרִית֗וֹ <WH1285> unto you his covenant אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which צִוָּ֤ה <WH6680> which he commanded אֶתְכֶם֙ <WH853> לַעֲשׂ֔וֹת <WH6213> you to perform עֲשֶׂ֖רֶת <WH6235> [even] ten הַדְּבָרִ֑ים <WH1697> commandments וַֽיִּכְתְּבֵ֔ם <WH3789> and he wrote עַל־ <WH5921> on שְׁנֵ֖י <WH8147> them upon two לֻח֥וֹת <WH3871> tables אֲבָנִֽים׃ <WH68> of stone

וְאֹתִ֞י <WH853> צִוָּ֤ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD בָּעֵ֣ת <WH6256> me at that time הַהִ֔וא <WH1931> he לְלַמֵּ֣ד <WH3925> to teach אֶתְכֶ֔ם <WH853> חֻקִּ֖ים <WH2706> you statutes וּמִשְׁפָּטִ֑ים <WH4941> and judgments לַעֲשֹׂתְכֶ֣ם <WH6213> that ye might do אֹתָ֔ם <WH853> בָּאָ֕רֶץ <WH776> them in the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after אַתֶּ֛ם <WH859> you עֹבְרִ֥ים <WH5674> whither ye go over שָׁ֖מָּה <WH8033> in it לְרִשְׁתָּֽהּ׃ <WH3423> to possess

וְנִשְׁמַרְתֶּ֥ם <WH8104> heed מְאֹ֖ד <WH3966> Take ye therefore good לְנַפְשֹׁתֵיכֶ֑ם <WH5315> unto yourselves כִּ֣י <WH3588> since לֹ֤א <WH3808> did not רְאִיתֶם֙ <WH7200> for ye saw כָּל־ <WH3605> any תְּמוּנָ֔ה <WH8544> no manner of similitude בְּי֗וֹם <WH3117> on the day דִּבֶּ֨ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> [that] the LORD אֲלֵיכֶ֛ם <WH413> to you בְּחֹרֵ֖ב <WH2722> unto you in Horeb מִתּ֥וֹךְ <WH8432> out of the midst הָאֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> of the fire

פֶּ֨ן־ <WH6435> so תַּשְׁחִת֔וּן <WH7843> Lest ye corrupt וַעֲשִׂיתֶ֥ם <WH6213> [yourselves] and make לָכֶ֛ם פֶּ֖סֶל <WH6459> you a graven image תְּמוּנַ֣ת <WH8544> the similitude כָּל־ <WH3605> of any סָ֑מֶל <WH5566> of any figure תַּבְנִ֥ית <WH8403> the likeness זָכָ֖ר <WH2145> of male א֥וֹ <WH176> or נְקֵבָֽה׃ <WH5347> or female

תַּבְנִ֕ית <WH8403> The likeness כָּל־ <WH3605> of any בְּהֵמָ֖ה <WH929> of any beast אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> is on בָּאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> that [is] on the earth תַּבְנִית֙ <WH8403> the likeness כָּל־ <WH3605> of any צִפּ֣וֹר <WH6833> fowl כָּנָ֔ף <WH3671> of any winged אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> that תָּע֖וּף <WH5774> that flieth בַּשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <WH8064> in the air

תַּבְנִ֕ית <WH8403> The likeness כָּל־ <WH3605> of anything רֹמֵ֖שׂ <WH7430> of any thing that creepeth בָּאֲדָמָ֑ה <WH127> on the ground תַּבְנִ֛ית <WH8403> the likeness כָּל־ <WH3605> of any דָּגָ֥ה <WH1710> of any fish אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> is in בַּמַּ֖יִם <WH4325> that [is] in the waters מִתַּ֥חַת <WH8478> beneath לָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> the earth

וּפֶן־ <WH6435> and not תִּשָּׂ֨א <WH5375> And lest thou lift up עֵינֶ֜יךָ <WH5869> thine eyes הַשָּׁמַ֗יְמָה <WH8064> unto heaven וְֽ֠רָאִיתָ <WH7200> and when thou seest אֶת־ <WH853> הַשֶּׁ֨מֶשׁ <WH8121> the sun וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַיָּרֵ֜חַ <WH3394> and the moon וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַכּֽוֹכָבִ֗ים <WH3556> and the stars כֹּ֚ל <WH3605> all צְבָ֣א <WH6635> [even] all the host הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> of heaven וְנִדַּחְתָּ֛ <WH5080> shouldest be driven וְהִשְׁתַּחֲוִ֥יתָ <WH7812> to worship לָהֶ֖ם וַעֲבַדְתָּ֑ם <WH5647> them and serve אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which חָלַ֜ק <WH2505> hath divided יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> them which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH430> thy God אֹתָ֔ם <WH853> לְכֹל֙ <WH3605> to all הָֽעַמִּ֔ים <WH5971> unto all nations תַּ֖חַת <WH8478> under כָּל־ <WH3605> the whole הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <WH8064> under the whole heaven

וְאֶתְכֶם֙ <WH853> לָקַ֣ח <WH3947> hath taken יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> But the LORD וַיּוֹצִ֥א <WH3318> you and brought you forth אֶתְכֶ֛ם <WH853> מִכּ֥וּר <WH3564> furnace הַבַּרְזֶ֖ל <WH1270> out of the iron מִמִּצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> [even] out of Egypt לִהְי֥וֹת <WH1961> become ל֛וֹ לְעַ֥ם <WH5971> to be unto him a people נַחֲלָ֖ה <WH5159> of inheritance כַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> as [ye are] this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> he

וַֽיהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Furthermore the LORD הִתְאַנֶּף־ <WH599> was angry בִּ֖י עַל־ <WH5921> with דִּבְרֵיכֶ֑ם <WH1697> with me for your sakes וַיִּשָּׁבַ֗ע <WH7650> and sware לְבִלְתִּ֤י <WH1115> not עָבְרִי֙ <WH5674> that I should not go over אֶת־ <WH853> הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <WH3383> Jordan וּלְבִלְתִּי־ <WH1115> not בֹא֙ <WH935> and that I should not go אֶל־ <WH413> about הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> land הַטּוֹבָ֔ה <WH2896> in unto that good אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> which יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God נֹתֵ֥ן <WH5414> giveth לְךָ֖ נַחֲלָֽה׃ <WH5159> thee [for] an inheritance

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אָנֹכִ֥י <WH595> I מֵת֙ <WH4191> But I must die בָּאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> in this land הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> I אֵינֶ֥נִּי <WH369> must not עֹבֵ֖ר <WH5674> I must not go over אֶת־ <WH853> הַיַּרְדֵּ֑ן <WH3383> Jordan וְאַתֶּם֙ <WH859> you עֹֽבְרִ֔ים <WH5674> but ye shall go over וִֽירִשְׁתֶּ֕ם <WH3423> and possess אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֥רֶץ <WH776> land הַטּוֹבָ֖ה <WH2896> that good הַזֹּֽאת׃ <WH2063> So

הִשָּׁמְר֣וּ <WH8104> Take heed לָכֶ֗ם פֶּֽן־ <WH6435> not תִּשְׁכְּחוּ֙ <WH7911> unto yourselves lest ye forget אֶת־ <WH853> בְּרִ֤ית <WH1285> the covenant יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹ֣הֵיכֶ֔ם <WH430> your God אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which כָּרַ֖ת <WH3772> which he made עִמָּכֶ֑ם <WH5973> you וַעֲשִׂיתֶ֨ם <WH6213> with you and make לָכֶ֥ם פֶּ֙סֶל֙ <WH6459> you a graven image תְּמ֣וּנַת <WH8544> [or] the likeness כֹּ֔ל <WH3605> of any אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which צִוְּךָ֖ <WH6680> hath forbidden יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> [thing] which the LORD אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <WH430> thy God

בְּעֵ֨בֶר <WH5676> On this side הַיַּרְדֵּ֜ן <WH3383> Jordan בַּגַּ֗יְא <WH1516> in the valley מ֚וּל <WH4136> over against בֵּ֣ית פְּע֔וֹר <WH1047> Bethpeor בְּאֶ֗רֶץ <WH776> in the land סִיחֹן֙ <WH5511> of Sihon מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king הָֽאֱמֹרִ֔י <WH567> of the Amorites אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who יוֹשֵׁ֖ב <WH3427> who dwelt בְּחֶשְׁבּ֑וֹן <WH2809> at Heshbon אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> whom הִכָּ֤ה <WH5221> smote מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> whom Moses וּבְנֵֽי <WH1121> and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel בְּצֵאתָ֖ם <WH3318> after they were come forth מִמִּצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> out of Egypt

וַיִּֽירְשׁ֨וּ <WH3423> And they possessed אֶת־ <WH853> אַרְצ֜וֹ <WH776> his land וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֶ֣רֶץ ׀ <WH776> and the land ע֣וֹג <WH5747> of Og מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king הַבָּשָׁ֗ן <WH1316> of Bashan שְׁנֵי֙ <WH8147> two מַלְכֵ֣י <WH4428> kings הָֽאֱמֹרִ֔י <WH567> of the Amorites אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> were בְּעֵ֣בֶר <WH5676> which [were] on this side הַיַּרְדֵּ֑ן <WH3383> Jordan מִזְרַ֖ח <WH4217> east side שָֽׁמֶשׁ׃ <WH8121> east side

מֵעֲרֹעֵ֞ר <WH6177> From Aroer אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> is on שְׂפַת־ <WH8193> which [is] by the bank נַ֧חַל <WH5158> of the river אַרְנֹ֛ן <WH769> Arnon וְעַד־ <WH5704> far הַ֥ר <WH2022> even unto mount שִׂיאֹ֖ן <WH7865> Sion ה֥וּא <WH1931> he חֶרְמֽוֹן׃ <WH2768> which [is] Hermon

וְכָל־ <WH3605> all הָ֨עֲרָבָ֜ה <WH6160> And all the plain עֵ֤בֶר <WH5676> on this side הַיַּרְדֵּן֙ <WH3383> Jordan מִזְרָ֔חָה <WH4217> eastward וְעַ֖ד <WH5704> far יָ֣ם <WH3220> even unto the sea הָעֲרָבָ֑ה <WH6160> of the plain תַּ֖חַת <WH8478> the foot אַשְׁדֹּ֥ת <WH794> under the springs הַפִּסְגָּֽה׃ <WH6449> of Pisgah פ
